greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number k having n representations as the sum of the minimal number of biquadrates A002377(k).
comment: This sequence is not monotonically increasing: a(21)=33230 > a(26)=29563.
example: a(1) = 1 since 1 = 1^4 (1 way with minimal representation)
a(2) = 259 since 259 = 1^4 + 1^4 + 1^4 + 4^4 = 2^4 + 3^4 + 3^4 + 3^4 (2 ways with minimal representation)
mathematica: t=Table[r=PowersRepresentations[n,19,4]; Sort[Tally[19-Count[#,0]&/@r]][[1,2]], {n,800}]; u=Union[t]; c=Complement[Range[Max[u]],u]; If[c=={}, mx=u[[-1]], mx=c[[1]]-1]; Flatten[Table[Position[t,n,1,1],{n,mx}]]
results.author: _Martin Renner_, Feb 09 2011
